oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Red Foley Show
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt from radio program the Red Foley Show, featuring Red Foley (host/performer), Slim Wilson (performer), Faron Young (performer), Tabby West (performer), and Billy Walker (performer), date and episode number unknown.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red Foley; Slim Wilson; Faron Young; Tabby West; Billy Walker
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening statement and theme (Red Foley) -- (00:27) The Guitar Man (Red Foley) -- (02:30) Foley thanks the audience -- (02:57) U.S. Armed Forces commercial -- (03:48) Foley introduces the next tune -- (03:56) No One To Cry To (Red Foley) -- (06:15) Foley thanks the audience and introduces Slim Wilson -- (06:34) Five Minute Rehearsal (Slim Wilson) -- (07:47) Foley talks and introduces this week's guest Faron Young -- (08:19) Young thanks Foley, talks, and introduces the next tune -- (09:01) Baby And Me (Faron Young) -- (10:50) Young thanks Foley and the audience -- (11:05) U.S. Armed Forces commercial -- (12:47) Steal Away (Red Foley) -- (16:26) Foley thanks the audience and introduces Tabby West -- (16:41) If You Promise Not To Tell A Soul (Tabby West) -- (18:07) Government job commercial -- (19:31) Foley introduces Billy Walker -- (19:50) It'll Take A While (Billy Walker) -- (21:40) Closing statements and theme (Red Foley)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Red Foley show (Radio program); Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Wilson, Slim; Young, Faron; West, Tabby; Walker, Billy;
